Title: Druids of Dumnonia
Description: This is a University Exploration Project into replacing VR controllers with just one Leap Motion Controller.

Title: Mazes of Madness
Description: Mazes of Madness is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler game that utilises a fluid combat system to progress through the dungeon and collect coins to purchase item upgrades that will allow the player to fight bosses and increase their score.

Title: Paladin-Cross
Description: This is a Paladin, 3rd person over the shoulder view game for Comp2007 project at the University of Plymouth for Bsc(Hons) Computing & Games Development Stage 2.

Title: Deep Space Outlaw
Description: This is a rogue-lite genre game set in the midst's of space where the objective is to survive and collect items that can be equipped to power up the ship. Asteroids are definitely your enemy as colliding with them is devastating!

Title: Castle Lib
Description: An archer is the sole military survivor of an attack on the kingdom. He must defeat all the enemy soldiers and liberate each of the castles of the kingdom.
